thread.section_title: NorthShore Care Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NorthShore Care Supply | www.northshorecare.com | 3 of 335
thread.title: Katarina
thread.title_full: NorthShore Care Supply reviewed by Katarina

author: Katarina
title: Katarina
text: We have been looking for effective, absorbent, comfortable overnight diapers for a long time. I was thrilled to discover that North Shore would send me free samples of two of their bestselling ones. They arrived promptly. We've only tested one so far - the North Shore Air Supreme Brief - and it performed as promised, For the first time in over a year he was able to sleep through the night. We'll test the other sample and see which he prefers but I know a solution is at hand. Big thanks to the people at North Shore for allowing a test run on this!
